title: #73 Danny & Jerry O'Connell (Bravo's Play by Play) Talk ALL Things Bravo & More
itunes:title: #73 Danny & Jerry O'Connell (Bravo's Play by Play) Talk ALL Things Bravo & More
itunes:subtitle: Danny welcomes Jerry O'Connell (host of Bravo's Play by Play/human gem) to the studio to talk all things Bravo-- the current season of #RHOC, the upcoming #RHOBH, casting hopes for #RHONY, Showdog Moms & Dads, #RHOA, and SO much more. The...
description:
Danny welcomes Jerry O'Connell (host of Bravo's Play by Play/human gem) to the studio to talk all things Bravo-- the current season of #RHOC, the upcoming #RHOBH, casting hopes for #RHONY, Showdog Moms & Dads, #RHOA, and SO much more. They also talk about his role in Mariah Carey's iconic "Heartbreaker" music video, 90 Day Fiance, Wendy Williams, his role in Scream 2, and lots more.


*To support this podcast & for bonus episodes, visit Patreon.com/EverythingIconic
